name: HELLO NATURE Vegamin
description: Vegamin is a liquid organic biostimulant 100% of vegetal origin for fertigation, suitable for organic farming. It is a fusion of organic NPK, organic matter and vegetal extracts that energizes plant growth and improves biological and physical soil quality, increasing fertility. Thanks to its slow-release organic NPK from vegetal source it can be applied throughout the growing season without risk of phytotoxicity providing instant plant energy and an immediate food source for soil microbes to improve the rhizosphere.

Product Families: Other Plant Health, Nutrients & Soil Management Products
